mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Understands that Ravenscroft can supply him with a carding machine with six inch cards to go by hand for 60 dollars; describes other machines he owns; says if Ravenscroft can furnish him with the machine he should write and inform Jefferson so he can send a cart to get it.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1812 July 3, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to John Ravenscroft, n.p.
